page.shortlink: ux controlbar items advanced generate javascript property
page.description: Specifies JavaScript to execute to generate the disclosure to display.

discussion.p: The *[ui:Generate Javascript]* property can be used to generate the JavaScript required to display a disclosure. A *[ui:disclosure-button]* has less flexibility than a regular button. The JavaScript generated by this property can be placed in an *[ui:Action]* that is executed when the user clicks a regular button.
